channel.title: Camping on Peaks and Plains
channel.description: Recent content in Camping on Peaks and Plains

item.title: Upper Kananaskis Lake
item.description: Weekend camping trip with friends at Boulton Creek Campground. We walked part of the way around Upper Kananaskis Lake - always a beauty! Date: 2018-07-20 to 2018-07-21 Location: Kananaskis Friends: Sonia, Lisa, Michelle, Tess, Annie, Alecia, Connie

item.title: Table Mountain, Road trip through Castle and Waterton
item.description: Canada Day road trip through Castle and Waterton park. Date: 2018-06-30 to 2018-07-02 Location: Castle Provincal Park, Waterton National Park Friends: Chris, and a caravan along the way Drive to Castle We started off with the most scenic drive down Highway 533, then Highway 22 - also known as Cowboy Trail. I don’t think this highway has ever disappointed me with its views. Castle Falls was a gorgeous and quiet campground, filled with the rushing sound of water from the nearby Castle Falls.
